mapper.insert: INSERT INTO monthly_rating_as_app(review_month, coupang_rating, wemap_rating, tmon_rating) VALUES (#{reviewedMonth}, #{coupangRating}, #{wemapRating}, #{tmonRating}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE coupang_rating=#{coupangRating}, wemap_rating=#{wemapRating}, tmon_rating=#{tmonRating}
mapper.select: SELECT review_month, coupang_rating, wemap_rating, tmon_rating FROM monthly_rating_as_app ORDER BY review_month DESC LIMIT 12
